Description: Filters the result to only include Servers whose behaviors include <behavior> (Note: be mindful of the English spelling in the behaviour parameter)
Filters the result to only includes Servers whose Role name (not Farm Role Alias) matches <role name>
Filters the result to only includes Servers whose Role ID (not Farm Role ID) matches <role id>
Filters the result to only includes Servers whose Farm Role ID matches <farm role id>
By default the response does not include Servers in Initializing State. Pass this flag to include them.
